name: Crazy Horse Cart Race
description:
You never see live horse cart racing in your life. Because it not popular sports race as horse racing is popular in the world. this game ha complete different horse racing story with multiple tracks, different horse carts. Ride horse with cargo cart, fun fast with opponents, challenge others for cart racing is not a dream or thinking, it reality you will enjoy to play this unique horse cart riding game. You have played many car, bike or other racing and action shooting games with same story. Press acceleration button for go fast, drift on road or aim the target and shoot them.

But Crazy Horse Cart Race is not like these games. You have to maintain the speed and as well as horse stamina. As your pony run fast the stamina will be decrease, so put your finger from boost button and maintain the stamina of horse. Jockey beat the horse for run fast. Crazy Horse Cart Race
is a real fun, trick and adventure game with 30 different missions of high speed race.

Crazy Horse Cart Race game has very simple and easily game play. interesting animations of cart and horse In this racing game, you can control horse buggy very easy with tilt your device. Take adventure ride in horse carriage cart on racing tracks in simulator game and enjoy the fun of farms, villages and town. Express your super horse cart driving skills and you'll get crazy and virtual riding experience of carriage cart driving.

Crazy Horse Cart Race Features

Different horse and cart models
Realistic racing track in stadium with full of crowd
HD graphics and realistic horse’s animations
Amazing 30 game missions
Boost up your horse and win the race
Choose your favorite horse/stallion
Very smooth and easy control
Stunning 3D graphics and challenging race
